# 智能时代的传媒变革与发展

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhineng-shidai-de-chuanmei-biange-yu-fazhan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhineng-shidai-de-chuanmei-biange-yu-fazhan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhineng-shidai-de-chuanmei-biange-yu-fazhan
zhineng-shidai-de-chuanmei-biange-yu-fazhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhineng-shidai-de-chuanmei-biange-yu-fazhan
zhineng-shidai-de-chuanmei-biange-yu-fazhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
